detail_desc: Flannel shirt in a woven cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a rib-knit stand-up collar and wide raglan sleeves with foldover ribbing at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a rib-knit stand-up collar and wide raglan sleeves with foldover ribbing at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Calf-length skirt in glossy jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, a decorative seam at the front for a draped effect and an asymmetric hem. Lined.

Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a smocked bodice and small, smocked stand-up collar with a frilled edge. Concealed zip at the back, long, wide puff sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Gathered seam with concealed elastication at the waist and a lined, softly draping skirt.

Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a smocked bodice and small, smocked stand-up collar with a frilled edge. Concealed zip at the back, long, wide puff sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Gathered seam with concealed elastication at the waist and a lined, softly draping skirt.

Sleeveless satin jumpsuit in a narrow cut at the top with a stand-up collar with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and an open section at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top. The jumpsuit is made partly from recycled polyester.

Sleeveless satin jumpsuit in a narrow cut at the top with a stand-up collar with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and an open section at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top. The jumpsuit is made partly from recycled polyester.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Chunky, fluted soles.
Calf-length, pleated dress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in airy tulle with visible vertical seams. Straight cut at the top with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and a flared, voluminous skirt. Sewn-in inner dress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Blouse in soft, washed cotton denim with a small, frilled collar, yoke, press-studs down the front and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length leggings in sturdy jacquard-patterned jersey. Regular waist with concealed elastication and slim legs.
Ankle-length leggings in sturdy jacquard-patterned jersey. Regular waist with concealed elastication and slim legs.
Fitted top in jersey with a lace yoke at the back, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a lace yoke at the back, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.

Hi-tops in shimmering imitation leather with a lightly padded shaft, appliqués on the tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles. Fluted soles.
Shirt in soft, patterned narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).
All-in-one pyjamas in soft fleece with a zip at the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft fleece with a zip at the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft fleece with a zip at the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft fleece with a zip at the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas in soft velour with an appliqué on the front. Top with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.

Pyjamas in soft velour with an appliqué on the front. Top with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Belly bands in soft viscose jersey that provide a comfortable feeling over the tummy and hide the gap between your top and trousers.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a string back and lined gusset with press-studs. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Dungaree dress in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an embroidered motif on the front, crossover straps at the back, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy, patterned weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool and cashmere with a faux fur pompom on top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool and cashmere with a faux fur pompom on top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Flared leggings in ribbed cotton jersey with a regular, elasticated waist.

Lace top with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a flared flounce at the cuffs, and raw, scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Set with a hat and pair of gloves in a soft fine knit. Hat with a fabric appliqué on the upturned hem. Gloves with ribbed cuffs.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in a soft knit. Hat in a textured knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and a ribbed hem. Fleece lining. Twisted, rib-knit tube scarf.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with faux fur ears on top.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with a felted hat on top.

Super push-up bra in lace with decorative, crossover straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Witch’s hat in satin-covered felt with a shimmering pattern. Hair extensions at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a narrow decorative trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a narrow decorative trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Wide cardigan knitted in a soft alpaca blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Wide cardigan knitted in a soft alpaca blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Wide cardigan knitted in a soft alpaca blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Metal tiara with sparkly glass and plastic stones.
Plastic bucket in the shape of a pumpkin with a handle at the top. Height 12 cm.
Short jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved body in lace with a lined front, round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Seam with a jersey lower section, a lined gusset, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Long-sleeved body in stretch fabric with a stand-up collar, opening front and back, and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips, a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Long-sleeved body in stretch fabric with a stand-up collar, opening front and back, and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips, a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Long-sleeved body in stretch fabric with a stand-up collar, opening front and back, and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips, a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Boxy jumper knitted in a supersoft alpaca and wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with wide sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Boxy jumper knitted in a supersoft alpaca and wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with wide sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.
Peep-toed ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and covered heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Short, boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length coat in soft, felted fabric with a stand-up collar, concealed covered press-studs down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Welt side pockets, decorative seams at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and V-shaped opening at the top.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and V-shaped opening at the top.
Checked scarf in a soft weave with short fringes around the edges.
Checked scarf in a soft weave with short fringes around the edges.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. Seam at the waist with a wide, pleated waistband at the front and elastication at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with pleats and covered buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. Seam at the waist with a wide, pleated waistband at the front and elastication at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with pleats and covered buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
